message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. Given its value, I'm initially offering it at $2,300,000. I'm confident this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am proposing to purchase the product for $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the gap between our valuations is still significant. I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I must stay within my budget. I am willing to offer $1,400,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
